bio:
Banning is a Breton man who works as a dog breeder. He has dark brown hair. He lives outside of Markarth, in the Markarth Stables. 
His family has been training war-dogs for many years, and he has followed in their footsteps. He will offer to sell the player a dog named Vigilance for 500 gold.
Banning may also ask the player to deliver some "spiced beef" to Voada in Understone Keep in the city. Voada handles the dogs owned by the Jarl of Markarth. Banning is secretly a cannibal with the taste for human flesh. He also secretly feeds his dogs human flesh. He first acquired his taste for human flesh when he accidentally killed his friend Marex on a hunting trip. Banning will never admit to being a cannibal unless he is being conversed with inside Reachcliff Cave, which secretly houses a shrine to Namira.
Quotes:
"A war dog is good company and good protection. He'll follow you to Oblivion and back, if it comes to that."
"Need a trained war dog? Fiercest companion money can buy."
"My family has been training dogs for years. You need one out in the Reach. Don't want to be alone when some Forsworn comes swinging. I personally trained a whole litter for the Jarl. That reminds me, I was going to deliver some dog food to the Keep. Spiced beef. Their favorite."
You have to train a good war dog from a pup. Bite your arm clean off otherwise."
name: Banning
